about.title: We are Carnot Research
about.subtitle: Everything About Us
about.whoWeAreDesc: We are Carnot Research, a deep-tech AI company founded by professors, scientists, and engineers from top IITs, driven by a common mission: to bridge cutting-edge research with real-world deployment. Our team brings together over 120 years of collective experience in AI, NLP, and systems engineering, backed by multiple patents and top-tier publications.
about.whoWeAreDesc2: We specialize in building trustworthy, secure, and high-impact AI systems — particularly for high-stakes sectors such as government, enterprise, and regulated industries.
about.whatWeDoDesc: At Carnot, we build and deploy secure, on-premise GenAI systems with a strong focus on:
about.whatWeDoItem1: Multimodal data ingestion (PDFs, web, YouTube, scanned docs)
about.whatWeDoItem2: LLM-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with verifiable citations
about.whatWeDoItem3: Conversational AI with agentic workflows for governance and enterprises
about.whatWeDoItem4: Custom NLP and document intelligence solutions
about.whatWeDoItem5: LLM + VLM integration for visual reasoning and OCR-based tasks
about.whatWeDoItem6: Tech skilling and AI capability development for industry and public sector
about.whatWeDoDesc2: Our ability to conduct managed, deployable research sets us apart. We partner with organizations to convert deep-tech research into scalable tools, applications, and IP that directly serve strategic or operational needs.
about.missionDesc: Our mission is to enable responsible, domain-specific AI adoption across industries and governments. Whether it's powering public-facing governance chatbots, automating knowledge from policy documents, or deploying enterprise RAG systems — we deliver AI that works on-ground, at-scale, and in-context.
about.missionDesc2: Our core strengths lie in NLP, Vision-Language models, and agentic systems, with seamless linkages to IoT, Cybersecurity, and Blockchain where required. From startups to Fortune 500s to ministries, we are building the infrastructure for India's next leap in AI-driven transformation.

research.title: Research Areas
research.subtitle: We conduct research in primarily 2 areas.
research.nlp_p1: At Carnot Research, our NLP work focuses on building deployable, domain-specific language models that extract intelligence from unstructured, multilingual, and multimodal data — such as documents, web pages, audio, video, and scanned PDFs. Our goal is to make machines truly understand, reason with, and generate human language in contextually grounded, verifiable ways.
research.nlp_p2: We help organizations unlock insights from complex data — including policy documents, regulations, citizen queries, support tickets, contracts, feedback forms, and media content — powering more responsive, intelligent, and scalable systems.
research.nlp_qna_desc: Answer domain-specific queries with citations from trusted documents.
research.nlp_sum_desc: Generate concise, actionable summaries from long reports or policies.
research.nlp_stt_desc: Convert audio content (meetings, calls, citizen voices) into searchable transcripts.
research.nlp_ocr_desc: Digitize and understand scanned or handwritten documents using OCR + VLMs.
research.cv_desc: We use state of art approaches in computer vision and deep learning to help organizations extract, analyze and understand information from images & videos. By integrating computer vision technology into existing systems, organizations can automate and improve speed of various mechanical processes and also reduce operational costs. Our R&D team is constantly evaluating and testing latest approaches, taking on new client challenges in different areas.
research.cv_obj_det_desc: Pedestrian Detection, Medical Imaging, Image Search, Automatic Image Annotation, Object Counting.
research.cv_face_desc: Retail Crime Prevention, Smarter Advertising, Facial Biometrics, Automated Attendance.
research.cv_video_desc: Patient Monitoring, Predictive Maintenance, Store Heatmap, Surveillance, Autonomous Vehicles.
research.cv_activity_desc: Security & Surveillance, Fitness Tracking, Fall Detection, Elderly Care, Event Detection.
research.cv_emotion_desc: Market Research, e-Learning, Remote Elderly Care, Couselling, Driver Fatigue Monitoring.
research.cv_pose_desc: Gait/Posture Analysis, Animation, Gaming, Virtual/Augmented Reality, Surveillance.
research.cv_depth_desc: Robotics & Trajectory Estimation, Augmented Reality, Haze & Fog Removal.
research.cv_seg_desc: Bio-medical Image Diagnosis, Autonomous Driving, Satellite Image Processing, Precision Agriculture.
research.cv_tracking_desc: Sports Analytics, Human-Computer Interaction, Autonomous Driving, Surveillance.
research.nlp_ner_desc: Extract structured information like names, locations, and policies from text.
research.nlp_class_desc: Automatically tag and route documents based on content and intent.
research.nlp_intent_desc: Understand user goals in conversations for accurate routing and response.
research.nlp_multimodal_desc: Integrate text, image, speech, and video for richer AI-driven insights.
research.nlp_sentiment_desc: Extract opinions and trends from social, internal, and public feedback data.
